meanings.definition: A type of building material made from compressed wood fibers.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used hardboards to build a sturdy shelf in the workshop.
meanings.sent2: The construction crew purchased hardboards to reinforce the walls of the new house.
meanings.sent3: When the hardboards started talking, the workers couldn't believe their ears!
meanings.sent4: The hardboards stood tall like guardians, protecting the structure from harm.
meanings.sent5: The hardboards gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing their strength and reliability.

meanings.definition: Boards that are rigid and durable, often used for construction purposes.
meanings.sent1: She stacked the hardboards neatly in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The hardboards supported the weight of the roof without bending or breaking.
meanings.sent3: The hardboards decided to go on strike, causing chaos at the construction site.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as unyielding as hardboards, never giving up on his dream.
meanings.sent5: The hardboards echoed with the sounds of progress as the building took shape.
